headline: What Recent Developments Mean For The HELLENiQ ENERGY Holdings ATSE ELPE Investment Story
summary: HELLENiQ ENERGY Holdings has seen its price target narrative reshaped, with fair value held at €8.73 while the discount rate and revenue growth assumptions have been fine tuned rather than overhauled. Analysts tying their latest views to an improved refining outlook have become more comfortable lifting published targets, such as the move from €6.60 to €8.50 and the clustering of other houses around €8.50, which supports a more neutral and balanced stance on risk and reward. This article...

headline: Everyone’s watching tech but the next big deals may be industrial
summary: Opening Bid Unfiltered is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube, or wherever you get your podcasts. There are dealmakers on Wall Street, and then there are the teams at Perella Weinberg. If you have a big deal to get done as a CEO, this is one of your first stops on the Street to try and make it happen. Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi sits down on the Opening Bid Unfiltered podcast with veteran deal maker Andrew Bednar, CEO of advisory firm Perella Weinberg. The firm was founded in 2006 by storied dealmakers Joseph Perella and Peter Weinberg. Bednar has had his own storied history in deal-making, rising the ranks from Salomon Brothers to Goldman Sachs (GS) to Bank of America (BAC) to now Perella Weinberg (PWP). He has overseen some very large deals in the process, including the $10.2 billion sale of the NYSE to Intercontinental Exchange and Kate Spade’s sale to Coach. Bednar reveals what he has learned from these pressure packed situations and what the outlook for deal-making is for 2026 and beyond. Listen on your favorite podcast platform or watch on our website for full episodes of Opening Bid Unfiltered.

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks for Long-Term Investors
summary: The best-performing stocks typically have robust sales growth, increasing margins, and rising returns on capital, and those that can maintain this trifecta year in and year out often become the legends of the investing world.

content.title: 3 Market-Beating Stocks for Long-Term Investors
content.summary: The best-performing stocks typically have robust sales growth, increasing margins, and rising returns on capital, and those that can maintain this trifecta year in and year out often become the legends of the investing world.

headline: Geopolitical Risks Are Mounting. Why Goldman Sachs Says Oil Will Keep Falling.
summary: Goldman Sachs  thinks that oil prices will fall further in 2026, despite a volatile cocktail of geopolitical tensions.  Analysts at the bank said Sunday that they expected “Brent/WTI to trend down further to 2026 averages of $56 and $52”, compared to current, respective, prices of $63.30 for  Brent crude futures  and $58.99 for  West Texas Intermediate futures  —both lower on Monday.  In particular, they stressed Washington’s “preference for strong energy supply” to keep U.S. production elevated ahead of midterm elections in November.

content.title: Geopolitical Risks Are Mounting. Why Goldman Sachs Says Oil Will Keep Falling.
content.summary: Goldman Sachs  thinks that oil prices will fall further in 2026, despite a volatile cocktail of geopolitical tensions.  Analysts at the bank said Sunday that they expected “Brent/WTI to trend down further to 2026 averages of $56 and $52”, compared to current, respective, prices of $63.30 for  Brent crude futures  and $58.99 for  West Texas Intermediate futures  —both lower on Monday.  In particular, they stressed Washington’s “preference for strong energy supply” to keep U.S. production elevated ahead of midterm elections in November.

headline: DOJ subpoenas Fed, Sell America trade, earnings: 3 Things
summary: The US Department of Justice (DOJ) has subpoenaed the Federal Reserve as it launches a criminal investigation into the central bank's Chair Jerome Powell. US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) drop in Monday's premarket as Wall Street finds the "Sell America" trade to be back on, finding safe haven in precious metals like gold (GC=F) and silver (SI=F). Earnings season kicks off for major bank stocks and Delta Air Lines (DAL) this week. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: DOJ subpoenas Fed, Sell America trade, earnings: 3 Things

Earnings season kicks off for major bank stocks and Delta Air Lines (DAL) this week.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
